summary: News: Channing Tatum to direct Gambit movie?
title: News: Channing Tatum to direct Gambit movie?
body:
News: Channing Tatum to direct Gambit movie?

Fans have waited so long for a Gambit movie that many forget Channing Tatum is attached to play the card throwing Cajun. Originally cast in 2014, Tatum’s involvement has been one of the few consistent factors in a movie that’s languished in development hell for many years. The proposed February 2019release date is looking a little ambitious right now, however with no director attached rumours…

View On WordPress

blog.description: || °• I ωαѕη'т вσяη тσ вє ѕσƒт αηd qυιєт. I ωαѕ вσяη тσ мαкє тнє ωσяℓd ѕнαттєя αηd ѕнαкє αт му fιηgєятιρѕ.•° ||〘 An original character based in Norse mythology and Marvel Comics 〙

title: °•I нαd ιт αƖƖ•°
body: ❝I do have a few good memories, most of them come from my first years in America. I was a star, the peoples darling. They loved me and they gave me everything I wanted. As a medium, I held the bridge of their beliefs in my hands and I could do anything with it. I was a sensation. I remember feeling alive back then, the parties, the music, the clothes- everything was extraordinary. And for a girl who had never had anything it was all I could have ever dreamed of. Seances at night, were I used my powers to rattle the table, call fourth strange sounds- and even sometimes create minor illusions- all while reading their faces for the information I needed to pretend those illusions were their pasts. But by day, I was less of a witch- more of the exuberant child who had yet to meet her fate. In those days America was beautiful. Everyone knew my name, and everywhere I went- I was treated like a lost love. In those days, I loved myself, my power- and the world, I was a child young and naive but so full of joy and hope for what I could be. After years of having nothing, I had it all. ❞

summary: Howard and Peggy travel to the future and meet the Avengers (Based on @mamalaz’s AU Gif Imagine) Pt. 2
title: Howard and Peggy travel to the future and meet the Avengers (Based on @mamalaz’s AU Gif Imagine) Pt. 2
body:
AN: This prompt was originally posted by @mamalaz and people were asking for a fic, so here we go! If anyone wants me to take it down or has a problem with it, please let me know (I don’t really know the rules involving using other prompts and writing based off of them)

Prompt: When Howard’s newest invention goes haywire in the middle of New York, both Peggy and Howard are thrown into the future. Peggy is surprised by how much she is loved. Howard is surprised by the opposite.

Warnings: Language, and Familial Discomfort (Son/Father)

Constructive Criticism makes me happy!

Part 1

Peggy and Howard looked around in awe as they followed their friend and his team into the Stark Tower lobby, jumping as J.A.R.V.I.S. sounded. “Welcome back, Avengers. And greetings to you Mr. Stark, Agent Carter. Sir has been informed of the most recent developments, and he has asked that you wait in the common room for his and Dr. Banner’s arrival.” The two out-of-timers raised an eyebrow as Rogers casually responded as they stepped onto a fancy looking elevator. “Thanks, J.A.R.V.I.S. Take us up, would you?”

“Of course, Captain Rogers.” The elevator ride was awkwardly silent, with Steve glancing over at his friends from the past every few seconds to Howard and Peggy openly staring at the two S.H.I.E.L.D. agents. Once the doors opened Clint wiggled his eyebrows and led them to the couches.   

As they settled onto the couches, the elevator dinged open once more, and the sound of Dr. Banner and Dr. Stark’s banter brought smiles to their teammate’s faces. Cap cleared his throat once the two were sitting. “Guys, this is Peggy Carter and Howard Stark. Peggy, Howard, these are my teammates Clint Barton, Natasha Romanoff, Bruce Banner, and…” he trailed off and looked awkwardly between the two Starks.

Tony grimaced, standing and walking over to where Howard sat, holding out his hand. “I’m Anthony, Anthony Edward Stark.” At Howard and Peggy’s shocked stares, he smirked. “Hello, father.”  Howard stuttered out a dazed “You’re a bit older than when I last saw you.” Tony rolled his eyes “Yeah, no kidding.” He looked at Peggy and visibly relaxed. “Aunt Peggy.”  Peggy stood and walked up to him. “Anthony, darling, you’ve aged so well.” His smile faded as she reached out and placed a hand over the arc reactor.

She frowned at feeling the arc’s surface and reached her hands to unbutton his shirt, revealing the scarring and reactor to those in the room “Anthony, what…?” He reached up and gently grabbed her hands, dropping them as he backed away towards Bruce. “I think that story is best left for another time. We still need to figure out how you got here. Can you tell us what happened?” Peggy nodded and took her seat next to Howard once more, jarring him out of his own thoughts. He took a breath and looked over at his friend, wincing at the glare she gave him and began speaking. 

“I created a machine to travel through time.” He looked towards Steve, “Had it worked like it was supposed to, we would’ve been able to travel through a portal to the day before Rogers took the plane down. But something happened, I don’t know what, yet, and took us to this time period instead.” Tony scoffed and Howard raised an eyebrow in his direction. “Is there a problem, Anthony?”

Tony shrugged and smirked. “Nah, I’m just remembering Mom sitting me down and telling me you and Aunt Peggy were missing. That also explains why you-” Steve interrupted him with a stern, “Tony...why don’t you and Bruce go down to the lab and search through old SI files. Maybe there’s something in there that can help us send them back.”

 The younger genius looked like he was going to protest. Before he could start though, the elevator doors opened, depositing one CEO of Stark Industries onto their floor, StarkPad in hand. “Tony, I need you at a board meeting in one hour, please don’t forget. And Natasha, please make sure he doesn’t escape the tower beforehand, I need to sway the board on the new budget-” She looked up, freezing in place at the guests on her couch. A beat later, she turned to her fiance, fire in her eyes.

 “What the hell did you do?!”

If you’d like to be tagged send me an ask, or comment below!

Tags: @fanfic-loverr @kimmycup @elisabpshady

reblog.comment:

Prompt: When Howard’s newest invention goes haywire in the middle of New York, both Peggy and Howard are thrown into the future. Peggy is surprised by how much she is loved. Howard is surprised by the opposite.

Warnings: Language, and Familial Discomfort (Son/Father)

Constructive Criticism makes me happy!

Part 1

Peggy and Howard looked around in awe as they followed their friend and his team into the Stark Tower lobby, jumping as J.A.R.V.I.S. sounded. “Welcome back, Avengers. And greetings to you Mr. Stark, Agent Carter. Sir has been informed of the most recent developments, and he has asked that you wait in the common room for his and Dr. Banner’s arrival.” The two out-of-timers raised an eyebrow as Rogers casually responded as they stepped onto a fancy looking elevator. “Thanks, J.A.R.V.I.S. Take us up, would you?”

“Of course, Captain Rogers.” The elevator ride was awkwardly silent, with Steve glancing over at his friends from the past every few seconds to Howard and Peggy openly staring at the two S.H.I.E.L.D. agents. Once the doors opened Clint wiggled his eyebrows and led them to the couches.   

As they settled onto the couches, the elevator dinged open once more, and the sound of Dr. Banner and Dr. Stark’s banter brought smiles to their teammate’s faces. Cap cleared his throat once the two were sitting. “Guys, this is Peggy Carter and Howard Stark. Peggy, Howard, these are my teammates Clint Barton, Natasha Romanoff, Bruce Banner, and…” he trailed off and looked awkwardly between the two Starks.

Tony grimaced, standing and walking over to where Howard sat, holding out his hand. “I’m Anthony, Anthony Edward Stark.” At Howard and Peggy’s shocked stares, he smirked. “Hello, father.”  Howard stuttered out a dazed “You’re a bit older than when I last saw you.” Tony rolled his eyes “Yeah, no kidding.” He looked at Peggy and visibly relaxed. “Aunt Peggy.”  Peggy stood and walked up to him. “Anthony, darling, you’ve aged so well.” His smile faded as she reached out and placed a hand over the arc reactor.

She frowned at feeling the arc’s surface and reached her hands to unbutton his shirt, revealing the scarring and reactor to those in the room “Anthony, what…?” He reached up and gently grabbed her hands, dropping them as he backed away towards Bruce. “I think that story is best left for another time. We still need to figure out how you got here. Can you tell us what happened?” Peggy nodded and took her seat next to Howard once more, jarring him out of his own thoughts. He took a breath and looked over at his friend, wincing at the glare she gave him and began speaking. 

“I created a machine to travel through time.” He looked towards Steve, “Had it worked like it was supposed to, we would’ve been able to travel through a portal to the day before Rogers took the plane down. But something happened, I don’t know what, yet, and took us to this time period instead.” Tony scoffed and Howard raised an eyebrow in his direction. “Is there a problem, Anthony?”

Tony shrugged and smirked. “Nah, I’m just remembering Mom sitting me down and telling me you and Aunt Peggy were missing. That also explains why you-” Steve interrupted him with a stern, “Tony...why don’t you and Bruce go down to the lab and search through old SI files. Maybe there’s something in there that can help us send them back.”

 The younger genius looked like he was going to protest. Before he could start though, the elevator doors opened, depositing one CEO of Stark Industries onto their floor, StarkPad in hand. “Tony, I need you at a board meeting in one hour, please don’t forget. And Natasha, please make sure he doesn’t escape the tower beforehand, I need to sway the board on the new budget-” She looked up, freezing in place at the guests on her couch. A beat later, she turned to her fiance, fire in her eyes.

 “What the hell did you do?!”

If you’d like to be tagged send me an ask, or comment below!

Tags: @fanfic-loverr @kimmycup @elisabpshady

“I created a machine to travel through time.” He looked towards Steve, “Had it worked like it was supposed to, we would’ve been able to travel through a portal to the day before Rogers took the plane down. But something happened, I don’t know what, yet, and took us to this time period instead.” Tony scoffed and Howard raised an eyebrow in his direction. “Is there a problem, Anthony?”

Tony shrugged and smirked. “Nah, I’m just remembering Mom sitting me down and telling me you and Aunt Peggy were missing. That also explains why you-” Steve interrupted him with a stern, “Tony...why don’t you and Bruce go down to the lab and search through old SI files. Maybe there’s something in there that can help us send them back.”

 The younger genius looked like he was going to protest. Before he could start though, the elevator doors opened, depositing one CEO of Stark Industries onto their floor, StarkPad in hand. “Tony, I need you at a board meeting in one hour, please don’t forget. And Natasha, please make sure he doesn’t escape the tower beforehand, I need to sway the board on the new budget-” She looked up, freezing in place at the guests on her couch. A beat later, she turned to her fiance, fire in her eyes.

 “What the hell did you do?!”

If you’d like to be tagged send me an ask, or comment below!

Tags: @fanfic-loverr @kimmycup @elisabpshady

blog.name: hoperesideswithinthismess
blog.title: This New Problem I Call Joy
blog.description: My name (and not my favorite color) is Red. I'm a guy. This tumblr of mine is primarily for fannish things or esoteric amusements. Occasionally something serious or thought provoking might creep in, and that's fine by me. I like to think I'm a nice sort of bloke. I take people as they are. If you want to be friends, cool, let's be friends.

blog.name: galinus-evilrocket
blog.title: SMALL WORLD — EXCITING MOVIE.
blog.description: Welcome to Small world — exciting movie. Here is the source of movies, cartoons, TV series, actors. and everyone else.

body:
Endgame theory?

Here’s a weird theory for endgame that I don’t think anyone else has come up with yet.

In order to make this theory work, I’m going to say that the marvel cinematic universe as we know it is actually taking place over multiple universes similar to each other with distinct differences (foreshadowed? By the ancient one in the Dr Strange movie); this could explain events such as how marvel did not address changing actors for War Machine and Hulk within the MCU, Bucky’s constantly changing birthday, how cap’s avengers outfit was ignored, and Dr Strange’s outfit and powers in Ragnarock differing from those shown in his solo movie and infinity war (this is only to name a few). By this logic, endgame doesn’t have to include as much time travel as it could dimension hoping to realities moving slower then the one they’re from through the quantum realm (this is why Tony Stark had to live because with Pym gone he’s the only one excluding Banner who could work this out) from here they could either find all the stones and defeat Thanos or find alternate versions of themselves and defeat Thanos (either way I think it’ll be cool), but what they find after this is that the snap cannot be undone (they’re dead, and those characters in that reality are all staying dead), and in trying to do so they get transported to another dimension where Tony runs to Peter(who is alive) and hugs him, but Peter shoves him away, cautious of him, and in this moment we truly see all the hurt that Tony has experienced, the realities he’s traveled to, and all the sacrifices that he made, and he lost the one person he gave up everything to protect. We see pepper in the rescue armour and all the ‘dead’ avengers behind her, they all stare at each other for a solid minute before Strange saids something ominous like “oh wow you’re here, and even I thought I was lying” before the screen cuts to black and the credits play. In a post credit scene, we see everyone gathered together in a room and the new avengers offer all the old avengers a spot on the team, they decide but it cuts to a black screen with the words ‘the avengers will not be remembered’ before their decisions are said. A few seconds later, Far from home begins, with Peter struggling to understand and contemplate the decisions of the ‘not snapped’ avengers and what being a hero really means.

summary: y’know, now that i really really like really focus think about it, trans peter parker is what got me actually interested in and...
body:
y’know, now that i really really like really focus think about it, trans peter parker is what got me actually interested in and into marvel in the first place.

spiderman was the first marvel hero i had ever known about. i knew about his existence as a character since i was like 5 or 6.

but i wasn’t really into things like that at that age.

then came my first marvel movie i watched- a spiderman movie, i don’t remember which one it was….? i just know it was spidey boi.

and i left marvel alone for a while. until black panther came out. that’s where i started getting curious about marvel, especially what with the whole after credits marvel tradition thing.

and so i watched civil war, and that’s where i really saw my spidey boi.

so then i watched homecoming. and i watched the original spiderman movies with andrew garfield and toby maguire. and now i’m like “yah ok spidey’s pretty cool” and then like a few weeks later i found out i was trans

and then i rewatched homecoming.

and i’m like yo.

m’boi spidey seems trans.

so i explore the headcanon.

and that’s when i become really attached to spiderman, and marvel as a whole.

cause i have me a trans peterman to feel attached to.

then i watched infinity war and cried over my BOI WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT MARVEL HE BETTER COME BACK.

then into the spider verse has me convinced that every spiderman/woman is trans and i love them all. well i actually hc gwen as nb but yeah. i love.

summary: The funny thing about Flash is that he may be the bully at that private school, but his ass wouldn’t stand a CHANCE in public...
body: The funny thing about Flash is that he may be the bully at that private school, but his ass wouldn’t stand a CHANCE in public high school. Rich know-it-alls are one of the MOST HATED PEOPLE. And it’s a bit sad because maybe he did go to public school at one time and that’s why he feels the need to torment others in an environment he feels powerful in. In this essay I will-
